section.title: Requirements
section.p: The Jmol application requires Java 1.2 or later. The latest Java 2 Platform Standard Edition is recommended.

section.title: Running Jmol with Java Web Start

section.title: Downloading the current release
section.p:
It can be downloaded using one of the following links:
jmol-$VERSION$.zip
jmol-$VERSION$.tar.gz
To access previous versions, please go to SourceForge

section.title: Obtaining the source code
section.p:
The source code can accessed via CVS, or downloaded using one of the following links:
jmol-$VERSION$.source.zip
jmol-$VERSION$.source.tar.gz
To access previous source code archives, please go to SourceForge.

section.title: CVS Access
section.p:
You can browse the latest source code online or anonymously checkout the project contained in the CVS repository.
